attributes.action: Stop the PCT postcode lottery on Sutent for Kidney Cancer Patients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Primary Care Trusts must change the awful postcode lottery and make Sutent freely available in every Trust to increase kidney cancer patients survival rates.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the PCT postcode lottery on Sutent for Kidney Cancer Patients."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20272


Prime Minister's Office
